openings.description: Modern door with Scandinavian design elements
Large windows installed to maximize natural light and ventilation

notes: Design adheres to local building norms and Vastu principles.
Budget considerations have been factored in with functional yet aesthetically pleasing Scandinavian design elements.
The cottage is designed for a G+2 structure with ground floor as described; second level includes similar layout with bedrooms, bathrooms, and living areas.
